FRBRalias.value: The Tamil Nadu Horse Races (Abolition Of Wagering Or Betting) Act, 1974

p.shortTitle: The Tamil Nadu Horse Races (Abolition Of Wagering Or Betting) Act, 1974

preamble.p: An Act to provide for the Abolition of wagering or betting on horse races in the State of Tamil Nadu.
Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of Tamil Nadu in the Twenty-fifth Year of the Republic of India as follows:—

content.p: The Act may be called the TAMIL NADU HORSE RACES )ABOLITION OF WAGERING OR BETTING) ACT, 1974.

section.heading: Amendment of Tamil Nadu Act 7 of 1949.—

content.p: in sub-section (2), the portion commencing with the expression "and Sections 2 and 4" and ending with the expression "appoint", shall be omitted.
after sub-section (2), the following sub-section shall be inserted, namely:

"(3) Sections 2 and 4 shall come into force on the 31st March 1975, notwithstanding anything contained in any law for the time being in force or in any notification or order issued by the Government."

section.heading: Certain orders to cease to have effect.—

content.p: The orders issued by the Government in G.O. Ms. No. 1570, Home Department dated the 7th June, 1973, shall cease to have effect with effect from the date of the publication of this Act in the Tamil Nadu Government Gazette.
